p: Stingless bee cerumen extracts have also been used as a potential anticancer agent with human breast, lung, liver, stomach and colon cancer cell lines, inducing high cytotoxicity and an apoptotic like cell morphology [ 15]. This study also showed that Î±-mangostin isolated from cerumen induced in vitro cytotoxicity against the above cell lines and in-vivo cytotoxicity against zebrafish embryos [ 15].
